idea:
The company was in the business of :-

1. (a) To carry on the business of trading electrical vehicle, assemblers of dealers in, hires, repairers, cleaners, Stores, warehouses, of motor cars. Motor cycles, cycle-cars, motors, scooters, boats and ships, vans, and other vehicles and conveyances of all descriptions for carrying passengers or other personnel ,goods, commodities, produce, cargoes and other things on land or sea or by air (all here in after comprised in .the term "Motors and other things") whether propelled or assisted by means of petrol, spirit, steam. gas, electrical, animal or other powers, and all engines, chassis, bodies, turbines, tanks, tools, implements, accessories and other things, materials and products used for, in or in connection with motors and other things.


(b) To buy, self, let on hire, repair alters and deal in machinery, component parts, accessories and fitting of all kinds for motors and other things and all articles and things referred to in items(s) hereof or used or Capable of being used in connection with the manufacture, maintenance and working thereof.


 2. To Manufacture Electronic Two-Wheeler and Three-Wheeler.
name: EXERVAL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Sardar Patel Technology Business Incubator (SP-TBI) is an incubation center founded in 2015 as an initiative of Bhartiya Vidya Bhavan’s Sardar Patel Institute of Technology and is affiliated with the Department of Science and Technology, Government of India. Our objective is to cultivate entrepreneurship, promote innovation and support daring entrepreneurs. We support motivated entrepreneurs to build businesses and ventures with cutting-edge and state-of-the-art technology through our services. We act as a catalyst for these start-ups to advance and flourish in the future. Our amenities include the best infrastructure, technology support, seed funding, talent pool, mentoring, training and much more. The SP-TBI supports technology start-ups from Education, Health, Energy, Agri-tech & IT Services. We also propose to extend our support to social enterprises making a larger social impact and enterprises led by women entrepreneurs. Till date, we have successfully incubated 70 start-ups and created employment for over 750 professionals.
name: YERRAMREDDY'S GO-GREEN TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
TriNANO coating can be applied to Mono-crystalline, Polycrystalline as well as Thin-film solar panels.

The coating can be done to New panels, (as an additional step in the production process of Panel manufacturing) or it can be done to existing panels in place.

So our customers would be

• New Panel Manufacturers like Waaree, Vikram Solar, Canadian Solar, Panasonic and Jinko

• Existing solar Plant owners like ACME Solar Holdings, Refex, Brookfield, Tata Power Solar etc

• EPC and O & M companies like Intersolar System Private Limited, Sirmouri Solar, Enrich Energy, Premier Solar System

For the New panel manufacturers, the coating would be an additional step in the production process of Panel manufacturing and we would provide them the technology – Coating material, coating machine/process and training and would charge them a fixed amount per panel.

For the Existing solar Plant Owners, we would provide the services for coating. The service fees would include the material costs, the machine costs, labor costs and the IP costs for TriNANO. The labor costs would depend on the actual location of the plant and also the type of installation – On Ground, roof-top or floating solar.

For the EPC and O & M companies, we will be licensing this technology to our strategic

partners who can then distribute it in their respective territories and markets. We will be providing the technology, the training, the material, and the machines to our license holders and charge them accordingly.
name: TRINANO TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Space Hub Solutions Pvt. Ltd. Storage on Rent Mumbai provides on-demand warehousing space for Home & business consumers and completes end-to-end logistics operations for our clients from Transporting the Goods from Source to our Warehouse, Inwarding the Goods, Quality Check, Storage, Dispatch, Reporting, and End Customer Delivery Transportation. We make storage easy, flexible and affordable, as it should be. Storage on Rent Mumbai . our main aim is to provide safe, secured and insured storage space and to make the storage experience as easy as possible by offering you a range of sizes and prices with payment option.
name: SPACE HUB SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
